channel.title: Need help with this
channel.description:
Ok this is what I need help with....
[b]Whenever I do ::char command in the freescapepkz source and log out and log in IT SAVES[/b]
When I do it in my server it doesn't save does anyone know how to make it so it save?
__________________________________________________________________________________________
My yell command is weird and when I do another command IT will yell part of that command can anyone help me fix thaT?
Also how do you make homes?
THANKS,
Check my sig ;)

item.title: Need help with this
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

} else if (command.startsWith("changecharacter") && playerRights <= 441) { showInterface(3559); }

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && (muted == 0) && (actionTimer == 0)) { command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay"); command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay"); command.substring(5).trim(); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - " + command.substring(5); actionTimer = 5; } else if (muted == 1) { sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); } else if (actionTimer > 0) { sendMessage("You must wait 5 seconds before yelling again."); }

[code] }
else if (command.startsWith(“bank”) && playerRights >= 1)
if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot bank in the wildy.”);
}
else
{
openUpBank();
}

	[/code]

those should work

Read full topic

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");

        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {

                    + command.substring(5);
